author: Joey D'Urso
title: This 'Spiritual' Bill Gates Quote About The Coronavirus Is All Over The Internet, But It's Fake
description: It was shared by two of Britain's biggest publishers, and several massive verified Facebook pages. View Entire Post ›
content:
A false Bill Gates quote about spirituality and the coronavirus appeared on social media on Sunday and within a day, after being shared by some verified Facebook pages with millions of followers, was written up by two of Britain's biggest news publishers.
It… [+8295 chars]
